inclusion.criterion: Stool output more than 4ml/kg/hour within the first 6 hours of observation period
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic illness requiring immediate administration of antibiotics.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Received antibiotics in the 24 hours prior to hospitalization
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with bloody mucoid diarrhea
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has profuse watery diarrhea without odor, V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
